about_the_game:
Dive into the vibrant universe of "Reflectron", an endless arcade game where geometry rules all. In this arena, each enemy is an opportunity, and each play is a chance to beat your high score. Armed with a single bouncing ball, face the challenge of a pure and thrilling gameplay where each contact could be fatal.

Immersive Gameplay

Instantly accessible, "Reflectron" is crafted for anyone who desires to plunge right into the action. With intuitive controls and an enticing progression curve, the game offers an unexpected depth that will compel you to come back for more challenges.

Cosmetic Customization

In "Reflectron", each victory brings the opportunity to personalize your gameplay. Accumulate coins through your sessions to unlock a variety of cosmetic items. Craft an avatar that reflects your individuality and stands out in the arena. Show off your style and originality with each new high score.

Visuals and Sound

Behold a visual ballet where each shape and color comes alive to the beat of a strong electronic soundtrack. The visual effects are not just a feast for the eyes; they are the vibrant feedback accompanying every one of your moves.

Competition

In "Reflectron," every game is a competition for the highest score. Face off against other players and prove your skill in this competitive environment where only perseverance is rewarded.

Key Features

  • Endless Arcade: A continuous challenge where the goal is to survive and thrive.
  • Dynamic Power-ups: Game-changing enhancements that ramp up the intensity of play.
  • Dynamic Visuals: A visual world that syncs with your performance and the beat.
  • Global Leaderboards: Compete against players around the world for a top spot.

"Reflectron" is not just a game; it's an ongoing challenge where every second could catapult you to the top. Prepare to enter the arena.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.8 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 4Ti or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required

short_description: Reflectron is a geometrically-styled arcade game that will keep you coming back for more. Halfway between a brick-breaker and Geometry Wars, with a pinch of Vampire Survivors thrown in for good measure, it's a simple yet effective mix that will keep you coming back for more.
